content.html: If you're interested in #Veganuary - trying a vegan diet for a month - there are loads of tips and recipes on veganuary.com/partner/happyc… And if you're looking for restaurants in your area which serve great veggie food - I thoroughly recommend happycow.net
content.value:
If you're interested in #Veganuary - trying a vegan diet for a month - there are loads of tips and recipes on veganuary.com/partner/happyc…

And if you're looking for restaurants in your area which serve great veggie food - I thoroughly recommend happycow.net
